title: Figure, "Friendship Between the Soviet Union and China", 1950–60
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Two girls sit together: fair haired girl in print dress holds embroidery frame with image of dove on her lap and has her arm around shoulders of Chinese girl in native costume who sits at her side; circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Friendship Between the Soviet Union and China", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-251.
